p: Plasma concentration time curves were constructed and the data were manipulated using WinNonlin Professional 4.0.1 software (Pharsight Corp., Cary, NC, USA), followed by calculation of pharmacokinetic parameters (C max (ng/mL), T max (hour), AUC 0–24 and AUC 0–∞ (ng·hour/mL, K el (hours −1), and t 1/2 (hours)) for each rabbit.
